cityfarmers.sendgift

Class SendGiftCtrl

  • java.lang.Object
    • cityfarmers.sendgift.SendGiftCtrl

  • public class SendGiftCtrl
extends java.lang.Object
    The SendGiftCtrl class facilitates the interaction between the database and the SendGiftMenu
    Version:
    1.0 08 Apr 2020
    Author:
    Wan Ding Yang
